Question
========
Which of the following is an accurate statement about motion with constant acceleration?

Answerlist
----------
* In equal times, speed increases by equal amounts.
* In equal times, displacement changes by equal amounts.
* In equal times, velocity changes by equal amounts.
* In equal times, acceleration changes by equal amounts.

Solution
========
Acceleration is the change in velocity over time. If acceleration is constant, then the velocity changes by equal amounts in equal times.
